metadata.titel_preek: Zählt nicht uns, sondern eure Tage

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The movement from a state of 'Allmachtswahn' (delusion of omnipotence) and 'Vergänglichkeit' (transience) toward a state of 'Weisheit' (wisdom) and 'Heimat' (home) in God through lament and prayer.

subject.identificatie: The Human 'I' / The 'We' (The community of hearers)
tekstueel_bewijs: Wir bringen unsere Jahre zu wie ein Geschwätz
Wir verstehen den Psalm nur richtig... wenn wir lernen ihn nur beten
Wir alle sind am Allmachtswahn beteiligt

object.identificatie: Ein Herz von Weisheit / Solidarität Gottes / Bestand der Hände Arbeit
tekstueel_bewijs: damit wir einbringen ein Herz von Weisheit
Sättige uns am Morgen mit deiner Solidarität
gib dem Werk unserer Hände Bestand

zender.identificatie: The Biblical Text/Tradition (Moses/Haggai) and the suffering reality of the poor.
tekstueel_bewijs: Die Bibel denkt nicht in zwei Stockwerken
Die Botschaft, die ich in diesem Psalm von der Straße höre
lass deinen Glanz über ihren Kindern leuchten
Gott du bist unsere heimat von generation zu generation
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies as the Subject who must learn to pray and count days.

helper.identificatie: The Holy Spirit (implied through the act of prayer) and Fritz Schumacher (Small is Beautiful).
tekstueel_bewijs: Gott will uns an der guten Macht des Lebens beteiligen
Schumacher begreift Wirtschaft... stellt er ein neues Denken des Maßes gegenüber
helper.rol_van_god: God is both the Goal (Object) and the one who enables the turning (Helper/Subject of the turning).
helper.rol_van_geest: External help that moves the heart to wisdom.

tegenstander.identificatie: Allmachtswahn (Delusion of Omnipotence), Technocracy, and the 'Megamaschine'.
tekstueel_bewijs: Industrien, die um des Profits willen Großkatastrophen in Kauf zu nehmen bereit sind
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just a personal sin but a systemic, global structure of destruction (SDI, nuclear power, economic exploitation).

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God's own movement: God turning back to humanity.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: God
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The preacher states that God's turning and our turning are 'one process' (ein Vorgang).

voorbeelden_god_subject: Gott flickt das zerrissene, verschlissene Leben.
Gott will uns an der guten Macht des Lebens beteiligen.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Wir bringen unsere Jahre zu wie ein Geschwätz.
Wir müssen unseren eigenen Kontext einbeziehen.

voorbeelden: Wir müssen uns auf den Kontext zu unserem Text einlassen.

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on 'Wisdom' (Savoir) as the corrective to false 'Power' (Pouvoir). It is a call to a new consciousness.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Resolution is found in the 'Turning' of God which mirrors the 'Turning' of man.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Very high; S2 is seen as a literal threat to the planet.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While the sermon uses strong grace-language regarding God as 'Heimat', the engine is largely prophetic-moralistic, calling the human subject to change their behavior and political stance to avoid catastrophe.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Noch können wir umkehren! ... An jedem Tag können wir Schritte der Umkehr einüben.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: Gott flickt das zerrissene, verschlissene Leben.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Fritz Schumacher is used as a model for the 'Heart of Wisdom'.
bijbelse_figuren_als_model: Mose (as the man of the Exodus/Lament)
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: God as the one who brings the 'Small' to life regardless of human technological choices.

identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism: God and man must turn together to save the 'woven fabric' of life.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The transition from the personal (father's death) to the political (SDI/Volkszählung) is structurally consistent through the theme of 'counting'.
spanning_punten: The tension between God's 'Zorn' as a natural consequence of wind/storm and God's 'Zorn' as a personal reaction.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Gott will uns an der guten Macht des Lebens beteiligen.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The sermon asks God to 'teach' (Lehre uns), implying an endowment of Savoir-faire.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Critical: Sin is the 'Allmachtswahn' that destroys the planet.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon successfully moves the hearer from a passive 'so it is' to an active 'how long, Lord?', but often places the burden of 'turning' on the human subject.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The human 'We' is the primary subject of 'turning' and 'resisting'.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Make God the subject of the 'Turning' that enables the human response.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'Noch können wir umkehren', use 'Gott hält uns die Tür zur Umkehr offen'.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: Hearer as the one who must 'weigh the days'.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Emphasize that the 'Heart of Wisdom' is a gift (Object) received from the Sender (God).

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: POUVOIR (God gives the power to live differently)
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Focus more on the 'Solidarität Gottes' as the source of power.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The opponent (Allmachtswahn/Megamaschine) is already very intense.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: The sermon already has a high 'gravity' regarding sin.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: The secondary program (Ethics/Politics) occasionally overshadows the primary (Soteriology).
narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Ground the 'Small is Beautiful' ethics more deeply in the 'God as Heimat' soteriology.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful prophetic sermon that uses the actantial model of 'counting' to bridge the gap between ancient text and modern political crisis.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorical analysis would focus on the use of Goethe and the personal anecdotes; Greimas reveals the underlying power struggle between the 'Megamaschine' and the 'Small'.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the Hebrew 'Mose' heading; Greimas shows how the preacher re-assigns the role of 'Mose' to the modern protester.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that 'Wisdom' is treated as a modal competence (Savoir) that changes the Subject's ability to act against the Opponent.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Political Theology' where the actantial roles are heavily socialized.
